subject: RE: [junit] How do I deal with JSP taglibs?
msgSnippet: Check out cactus! http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus It is designed for testing servlet, and taglibs in particular. Good luck! -Larry ... From: Bruno Teixeira de
messageBody:
Check out cactus!

http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus

It is designed for testing servlet, and taglibs in particular.

Good luck!

-Larry

-----Original Message-----
From: Bruno Teixeira de Abreu [mailto:brunotx@...]
Sent: Friday, November 22, 2002 10:57 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] How do I deal with JSP taglibs?


Does anybody know how can I test JSP taglibs using JUnit?
Thanks.

Bruno.
